name: Touring to Mỹ Sơn Sanctuary on Motorbike
description:
Hiding in a
green valley surrounded by mountains, Mỹ Sơn stands with time to reveal a unique
culture of a nation who once remarkably flourished along the coast of
contemporary Vietnam called Champa Kingdom. The My Son Sanctuary is an
exceptional example of cultural interchange, with an indigenous society
adapting to external cultural influences, notably the Hindu art and
architecture of the Indian sub-continent. It presents a vivid picture of
spiritual and political life in an important phase of the history of South-East
Asia.
